channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced Social Feeds Widget & Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced Social Feeds Widget & Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2024-0951|2024-03-18T19:05:52.481Z -- Unknown -- Advanced Social Feeds Widget & Shortcode
item.description: The Advanced Social Feeds Widget & Shortcode WordPress plugin through 1.7 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
